title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB:
It takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
NOTES:
EB: During the process of updating the checked state of the table, a busy cursor should be displayed. It should not take an excessive amount of time to update the checkboxes, aiming for a performance improvement.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Navigate to the export Zip feature.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose file types.
5. Press 'OK' or 'Export'.
